featured.text: Many people who are troubled by skin rashes caused by bug bites use “foggers,” or “bug bombs,” to get rid of the annoying crawlers in their homes.

definition.zh_def: 皮疹；皮膚上出現的紅色斑點或發炎。
definition.en_def: A skin condition characterized by red spots or inflammation.
definition.example: She developed a rash after using the new soap.
